titlestmt.titleproper: Buffalo Police Department general order books minutes and scrapbooks
titlestmt.author: Peter Nelson

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by Amy Miller.

did.unittitle: Buffalo Police Department general order books minutes and scapbooks

accessrestrict.p: Researchers wishing to access this collection must apply for a Scholar Pass and present valid photo ID upon arrival to the library.

bioghist.p: Superintendents of Police for the periods covered by this collection are John Byrne (1872-1879), Thomas Curtin (1883-1884), William A. Phillips (1879-1880, 1884-1887), Martin Morin (1887-1891), Daniel Morganstern (1891-1893), William S. Bull (1894-1906), Michael Regan (1906- 1915), and James W. Higgins (after 1933).

scopecontent.p: General order books, 1872-1878, 1885-1892, 1902-1906; telegraph blotter, 1883-1884; board of police minutes, 1915-1916; and two scrapbooks, ca. 1934-1948.

userestrict.p: Written permission required to reproduce and/or publish. Information on use and fees may be obtained from the Director of Library and Archives.
